long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your vocabulary while you browse!
Iâ€™m a web developer who loves learning languages and built this extension to integrate vocabulary practice into the daily browsing.

This extension is designed to:
  * Effortlessly define new words encountered while browsing.
  * Practice what you learn with built-in flashcards.
  * Expand your vocabulary organically as you explore the web.

Perfect for:
  * Language learners who want to maximize their exposure to new words.
  * Busy developers who want to squeeze in vocabulary practice during their workflow.
  * Anyone who wants to improve their communication skills.

This extension also serves as a showcase of my development skills. It's a practical tool built with clean code and user experience in mind.
Download it today and start building your vocabulary!



For developers: 
The app is totally open source, feel free to contribute if you like, any feedback will be appreciated .
